docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 7.-- A British cruiser stopped an outward-bound Spanish steamer seven miles off the coast, according to advices here today.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 7.-- A British cruiser stopped an outward-bound Spanish steamer seven miles off the coast, according to advices here today.
docs.abstract: British cruiser stops Spanish steamer in search for Luxburg

headline.main: British Seeking von Luxburg Hold Up a Spanish Steamer

docs.snippet: Uruguay's action in breaking off diplomatic relations with Germany is another symptom of the strong and growing anti-German feeling in the republics to the south of the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's action in breaking off diplomatic relations with Germany is another symptom of the strong and growing anti-German feeling in the republics to the south of the United States.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 11.--A complete and gratifying official statememt of the attitude of the Peruvian Government reached Washington today in a telegram from Francisco Tudela, the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Peru, to Secretary Lansing, formally...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 11.--A complete and gratifying official statememt of the attitude of the Peruvian Government reached Washington today in a telegram from Francisco Tudela, the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Peru, to Secretary Lansing, formally acquainting this Government with the successive steps that led to the rupture between Germany and Peru.
